lines.text: This was supposed to be a celebration, not an execution!
You couldn't catch me if your life depended on it!
One... two... three... four... five... once, I caught a fish alive.
Imagine... if it ever grows up, it'll be a dreadfully ugly child, but it makes a rather handsome piglet, don't you think?
The only ghost in this cave, will be this boy!
Leave him alone, you bully! If Peter were here...
If Peter Pan were here, I'd set anchor in his heart!
Just remember, Tootles... sticks and stones will break your bones...
I know, Wendy... but laughs and words will never hurt you... but they do.
